code: import{AppConfig,UserSession,showConnect}from'@stacks/connect';import{Person}from'@stacks/profile';var appConfig=new AppConfig(['store_write','publish_data']);export var Session=new UserSession({appConfig:appConfig});export function authenticate(){showConnect({appDetails:{name:'Bitfari',icon:'./logo.svg'},redirectTo:'/',onFinish:function onFinish(){window.location.reload();},userSession:Session});}export function getUserData(){return Session.loadUserData();}export function getPerson(){return new Person(getUserData().profile);}
